about_the_game:
The wonderful illustration Escape is the debut of the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collections of Masters of Puzzle. It will be the first in a series of puzzles that we will release this year and is part of the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This puzzle contains a variety of details that should make its assembly easier even for beginners. There are tricky areas that might take you a while to figure out, but that's also the fun part.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change

name: Masters of Puzzle - Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
